Description: Textile fragment; oblong fragment of undyed linen cloth; starting-border consisting of one group of transverse threads with warp looped-over in clumps; double self-band. 24 pricks in (c. 8mm) double self band. Other edges are worn (but the holes see, to be insect damage). The thread is S-spun and S-spliced; the stitch gauge is warp c.23 per 10mm and weft 20 per 10mm.
